title: Sampler, 1901
medium:
Medium: cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in running, double running, stem, satin, cross, double cross, marking cross,  long-armed cross, knots, eyelet, twisted lattice, interlaced trellis,  and composite stitches on plain weav
description: Thirty-four rectangles of pattern, central motif, and floral border in shades of pink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1901.
1901. Medium: cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in running, double running, stem, satin, cross, double cross, marking cross,  long-armed cross, knots, eyelet, twisted lattice, interlaced trellis,  and composite stitches on plain weav. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-172.
